import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import './School.css'; import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import './stars.css'; import Footer from "../../components/footer/Footer"; import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { getSchoolByName } from '../../actions/school' import { MdLocationOn } from "react-icons/md"; import { MdLibraryAdd } from "react-icons/md" function School() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch= useDispatch() let { id } = useParams(); console.log(id) let nso = id.replaceAll('_', ' ') console.log(nso) const school = useSelector((state) => state.school) console.log(school) const externalImage = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/do0puhubq/image/upload/v1674985967/Schools/AUBhome_gvbnvj.jpg'; const handlebutt=()=>{ navigate(`/AddDorm/${id}`) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getSchoolByName(id)); }, [dispatch]); return (
{school ? ( <>

{nso} Dorms

{school.City}

Browse 320 reviews from 18 dorms

NAMEEE

Rated: 3 stars

500$ per month

2 Reviews

500$ per month

2 Reviews

):( <>

School does not exist

)}
) } export default School
